channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
I have jdk 6 update 5 but every time i try to load my client it says this
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue . . .
this has happend with every differnt client i try to use when i click run.bat

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:3, topic:190940"][quote author=Robin hoodz link=topic=254504.msg2121735#msg2121735 date=1205990925]
I have jdk 6 update 5 but every time i try to load my client it says this

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI
Press any key to continue . . .

this has happend with every differnt client i try to use when i click run.bat
[/quote]

When will people learn that the version has absolutely nothing to do with their faults.[/quote]Never. That’s just the thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Edit the batch file and change EGUI in there to client
